location.description:
We offer professional buyout services with free equipment pickup from any location in Florida—no need for you to leave your home. In Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Hialeah, and Hollywood, you can sell your tools and receive cash on the spot within 1–2 hours.

For clients in other areas of Florida, our appraisers arrive within:

South Florida (2–4 hours): West Palm Beach, Hollywood, Boca Raton, Coral Springs, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Homestead, Aventura, and surrounding regions.

Central Florida (4–6 hours): Orlando, Tampa, St. Petersburg, Clearwater, Lakeland, Daytona Beach, Ocala, The Villages, and surrounding communities.

North Florida (6–8 hours): Jacksonville, Tallahassee, Gainesville, Pensacola, Panama City, Lake City, St. Augustine, and nearby areas.

listAsq.title: What kinds of shop vacuums do you purchase in Florida?
listAsq.content:
We buy all types of residential and commercial wet-dry vacuums, including compact shop vacs, heavy-duty units, cordless wet/dry vacuums, portable models, stainless steel vacs, and industrial-grade vacs.
We accept all major brands such as: RIDGID, DeWalt, Shop-Vac, Vacmaster, Craftsman, Milwaukee, Ryobi, Stanley, Kobalt, Makita, and Armor All.

listAsq.title: How do I sell my used shop vac?
listAsq.content: Selling your shop vac is quick and hassle-free. Just send us photos of the unit through any messenger app — WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, or SMS — along with a short note about its condition. Our team will respond with a cash offer in less than 10 minutes. Once confirmed, we’ll send someone to your location for same-day pickup and payment. If you’d rather come in, you’re always welcome to visit our local office.

listAsq.title: Who buys used shop vacs for cash?
listAsq.content:
There are several options available to sell your vacuum, but not all are convenient or safe:
  • Facebook Marketplace: You’ll often wait days for replies and meet with strangers.
  • OfferUp: Most inquiries come from flippers offering very low prices.
  • eBay: Decent exposure, but high fees and shipping risks.
  • Pawn shops: Fast transactions, but typically the lowest payouts.

With us, you avoid all the hassle — no listings, no strangers, and no delays. We offer a reliable, fast, and secure way to turn your shop vac into cash.

listAsq.title: When do I get paid for my shop vac?
listAsq.content: We issue payment immediately after confirming the vacuum is in working order. You can choose to receive your money in cash, check, or via bank transfer — whichever works best for you.

listAsq.title: Can I include hoses, filters, or other tools with my shop vac?
listAsq.content:
Yes — and including accessories like hoses, extension wands, filters, or attachments may increase the value of your offer.
We recommend wiping off any visible dust or debris and organizing the full setup before pickup to get the best quote possible.
